aboutSection.introText: I'm a dedicated web developer and graphic designer with expertise in modern tools and frameworks, including Laravel, React, After Effects, Figma, Illustrator, and Photoshop. I specialize in crafting visually striking designs and building scalable, user-friendly web applications. With a focus on collaboration and innovation, I turn creative ideas into functional, impactful solutions. Letâ€™s work together to bring your vision to life!

Traveler.name: Traveler
Traveler.description: A travel agency platform that allows users to explore destinations, book travel packages, and manage their trips seamlessly with curated recommendations and customer support.

ENTV Park Auto System.name: ENTV Park Auto System
ENTV Park Auto System.description: A comprehensive management system for ENTV's vehicle fleet, developed to streamline fleet operations and improve efficiency. Schedule routine maintenance. The platform also includes notifications.

NBR Airways System.name: NBR Airways System
NBR Airways System.description: An airline management system for NBR Airways that streamlines flight scheduling, booking management, and customer communication, ensuring an efficient and user-friendly experience.
